lead_paragraph: 7:30 p.m. | Updated Judy Katz, the spokesman for Bernadette Peters, just wrote with news that Ms. Peters had to turn down the "Follies" production in London "due to scheduling problems."
snippet: Bernadette Peters eyeing a London "Follies" as well as Kennedy Center version

headline.main: Bernadette Peters Keeping Her 'Follies' Options Open

abstract: Bernadette Peters eyeing a London "Follies" as well as Kennedy Center version
